channel.title: RuneSource
channel.description:
So, I decided to step over to something better, more stable etc. instead of using things like PI.
Though, I don't understand much of it. I would really like it if someone could help me :)

item.title: RuneSource
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

@OP Start with something like Azure, as this already has basic features added. There are also a few tutorials released for it, including tutorials released by the maker of Azure himself, that you can learn off of. Starting with the basic RuneSource is for someone with a bit more experience.

@Others, no, the basic RuneSource released by blakeman was not packaged.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

[quote=“dain bramage, post:8, topic:441338”][quote author=Level 120 Dungeoneering link=topic=544030.msg3988320#msg3988320 date=1336237704]

Look into the content of the server, and try to figure out the packaging.

There is no packaging.

I believe RuneSource is packaged…

No it isn’t. It was made to look like winterlove servers, which have no packaging.

I don’t know what RuneSource you’re downloading but 99% of RuneSource sources have packaging…
[/quote]
https://svn.assembla.com/svn/runesource/trunk/RuneSource/src/
Original RuneSource… No packaging. Sources built off RuneSource (such as Azure) usually will have packaging, but Blakeman’s RuneSource (the original) does not, simply because he thought it might encourage people who have no idea what packaging even is to use his source.[/quote]
Oh, didn’t know that. Actually thanks for the link.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

[quote=“Level 120 Dungeoneering, post:7, topic:441338”][quote author=dain bramage link=topic=544030.msg3988103#msg3988103 date=1336208644]

Look into the content of the server, and try to figure out the packaging.

There is no packaging.

I believe RuneSource is packaged…

No it isn’t. It was made to look like winterlove servers, which have no packaging.
[/quote]
I don’t know what RuneSource you’re downloading but 99% of RuneSource sources have packaging…[/quote]
https://svn.assembla.com/svn/runesource/trunk/RuneSource/src/
Original RuneSource… No packaging. Sources built off RuneSource (such as Azure) usually will have packaging, but Blakeman’s RuneSource (the original) does not, simply because he thought it might encourage people who have no idea what packaging even is to use his source.

Read full topic
